title: Faux Leather Jacket
shortDescription: Modern faux leather jacket â€” vegan-friendly, tailored fit.
longDescription: This faux leather jacket offers a sharp, tailored silhouette with soft, vegan-friendly faux leather. Features include a zip-front closure, two side pockets, inner lining for comfort, and reinforced seams for durability. Machine washable on a gentle cycle or spot clean as needed.

title: Classic Watch
shortDescription: Stainless steel classic watch with minimalist dial.
longDescription: An elegant timepiece featuring a polished stainless steel case and band, scratch-resistant mineral crystal, and a water resistance rating of 50 meters. The minimalist dial pairs well with both business and casual attire.

title: Canvas Tote
shortDescription: Durable canvas tote with roomy interior and reinforced handles.
longDescription: Made from 100% organic cotton canvas, this tote offers a spacious main compartment, an inner zip pocket for valuables, and reinforced handles for heavy loads. Perfect for groceries, books, or beach days.

title: Running Shoes
shortDescription: Lightweight running shoes with breathable mesh and cushioned sole.
longDescription: Designed for daily training, these running shoes feature a breathable mesh upper, responsive EVA midsole cushioning, and a durable rubber outsole for traction. Available in multiple colors and sizes.

title: Wireless Earbuds
shortDescription: Compact wireless earbuds with noise cancellation and long battery life.
longDescription: These true wireless earbuds offer active noise cancellation, up to 8 hours of playback per charge (30 hours with case), and touch controls for playback and calls. IPX4 splash resistance.

title: Sports Backpack
shortDescription: Water-resistant sports backpack with multiple compartments.
longDescription: Features include a ventilated back panel, padded laptop sleeve (15"), multiple organizer pockets, and adjustable padded shoulder straps for comfort during long commutes or travel.
